Utility.name: Directional Hoppers
Utility.description:
Gives Hoppers some markings on the side when their facing into a block. Also fixes the underside of Hoppers to not look so god-awful.
The directonal markings also apply to Grated Hoppers from [Hopper Ducts](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/hopper-ducts).

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Directional Dispensers/Droppers
Utility.description:
Gives Dispensers and Droppers some markings on the side when they're facing into a block. Also applies a fitting bottom texture to Dispensers and Droppers and lets them keep their side textures when facing up or down.

inspirationvt

Utility.name: Directional Observers
Utility.description:
Gives Observers some markings on the side when they're facing into a block. Also applies a little blob of Redstone to the top texture so that the player can see when the Observer is firing.

Utility.name: Degrading Tools
Utility.description:
Changes the textures of the Swords, Pickaxes, Axes, Shovels and Hoes of all materials, as well as those of the Bow, Flint and Steel and Shears to display wearing with degrading durability. The increments at which the degradation will show are 0-70%, 71-80%, 81-90% and 91-100%.

requiresefr

incompat{Comprehensive Tool Upgrade}
